attributes.action: Stop using the term, "Crashing out of the EU with no deal"
attributes.background: End the negative connotation over the last 3 years of, "Crashing out of the EU with no deal."  In the interests of fairness, the terminology should be replaced by positive words such as, "Soaring out of the EU with the WTO deal"

rejection.details: It's not the UK Government's or Parliament's responsibility to decide how people describe no deal.
